title: Game won't maximize
body: After the latest patch my game client wont maximize or save my video settings. using alt + enter only removes the borders and puts the game screen into the top left corner. changing the resolution or setting it to fullscreen makes the client bigger than my actual resolution and the mouse location becomes off. putting it back into windowed mode fixes the mouse so long as the resolution is smaller than my computers resolution. changing the cfg file has no effect, the game always resets to the lowest resolution and windowed mode. still does it even after a fresh reinstall.

replies.body:
Your resolution can get messy if you are using 4K, and if that's the case for you then you will need to stick to a lower resolution altogether.  Modifying files can also cause more problems than good, so your issue can be a combination of bad files.

This could also be due to driver issues that are outdated, so as a first step I recommend[ updating your graphics drivers](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+#wq2).  You may need to grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and run a clean reinstall for a fresh slate if that doesn't fix things up.  

There are a few steps here, but we need to rule out possibilities!  Let me know if your issue persists afterwards!
